noun.description: A service forming part of the Divine Office of the Western Christian Church, traditionally said (or chanted) at the sixth hour of the day (i.e. noon).

verb.description: Send (someone) sexually explicit photographs or messages via mobile phone.
examples: older teens are more likely to engage in sexting than their younger counterparts
the primary reason teenagers sext is to look cool and sexy to someone they find attractive
maybe my married friends do sext their partners

origin: Early 21st century: blend of sex and text.
